attribute.description: ID of the attribute of which the value should be checked. See [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute (Attributes)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attribute) for a list of vanilla attributes that can be checked for.
attribute.markdownDescription: ID of the attribute of which the value should be checked. See [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute (Attributes)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attribute) for a list of vanilla attributes that can be checked for.

comparison.description: Determines how the attribute's total value should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the attribute's total value should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the attribute's total value will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the attribute's total value will be compared to.

type.description:
## Attribute

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/attribute)

Applies a check towards a specific attribute value of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:attribute`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:attribute",
    "attribute": "minecraft:generic.armor",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 10.0
}
```

This example will check if the value of the entity's `minecraft:generic.armor` attribute is 10 or more.

This example will check if the value of the entity's `minecraft:generic.armor` attribute is 10 or more.
